objects.description: [APT29](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0016) has obtained and used a variety of tools including [Mimikatz](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0002), [SDelete](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0195), [Tor](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0183), [meek](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0175), and [Cobalt Strike](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0154).(Citation: Mandiant No Easy Breach)(Citation: F-Secure The Dukes)(Citation: Mandiant APT29 Eye Spy Email Nov 22)
